com.aseproject.facebook

Class BaseListElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aseproject.facebook.BaseListElement

  • public abstract class BaseListElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for a list element in the App main display, consisting of an icon to the left, and a two line display to the right.
    Author:
    Socratis Michaelides 2012

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseListElement(Drawable icon, java.lang.String text1, java.lang.String text2, int requestCode)
      Constructs a new list element.

      Returns the first row of text.
      java.lang.String getText2()
      Returns the second row of text.

      Callback if the OnClickListener happens to launch a new Activity.
